name: twik-man
desc: Tiny vicious humanoid riding a dragonfly.

name: Skeletal Rat
desc: Even the dead rats are a problem...
It appears to be missing all its fleshy bits.

name: Failed Experiment
desc: It appears to be some sort of long lost arcane experiment, with a mind of its own. It doesn't look friendly.
massive shimmering beetle with projecting horn

flavor: you remind me of the babe

name: hobbit slinger
flavor: How much damage could he do with just a sling?

desc: they say those who die on the cold heights search the passes for mortals to join them.
Rangers aren't very good with people.
One isn't too bad. 100 can be a problem.

name: mechanical swordsman
desc: Durable, but not very good at its job.
She doesn't look harpy to see you.

name: drunken boxer
desc: This monk has had a bit too much to drink...

name: large spider
desc: You can't tell if she looks hungry.

name: vampire bat
desc: It vants to zuck your blood.

flavor: vrrek is what most of their words sound like

name: greater zombie
desc: It ate up all the smaller zombies.

name: shrieking eel
desc: oversized eel with bladed teeth and a terrifying screach.
Ever wonder what orcs would look like if they were three times as large?
A nasty fey of cold disposition.

name: clay golem
desc: I made you out of clay...
Two heads are better than one.

name: wooden golem
desc: A golem crafted on a budget.

name: master swordsman
desc: He's looking for a six-fingered man.
It's a unicorn with wings and no horn.

name: stone golem
desc: The head stone's connected to the... spine stone.
Its horn is full of magic.

name: ice elemental
desc: What's so scary about a bunch of icicles?
An avian terror of mythic repute.
You could bounce a coin off those abs.

name: orc champion
desc: The strongest orc in the whole tribe!

name: undead horror
desc: You need to stop looking at it before you go insane.
It doesn't have a head. But you do.
From the waist up, it doesn't look that bad.
Only the objects flying at your head alert you to its presence.

name: fire elemental
desc: Too hot to get close to.

name: iron golem
desc: It moves with heavy clonking steps.

name: mind slayer
desc: It licks your brain with its mind.

name: lesser wyrm
desc: A cross between a worm and a dragon.

name: vampire master
desc: Worked his way up the vampire ranks, and has his very own brood now.

name: desilla's concubine
desc: A devoted follower of the sorceress Desilla.

name: fire golem
desc: Crafted from only the finest phlogiston.

flavor: You should have stayed out of the cloudspine.

desc: Body of a lion. Face of a giant eagle.

name: bog witch
desc: Vicious witch in the waters of the Great Bog

name: skeleton lord
desc: Are those rubies in its eyes?
Not a dragon. But it will kill you like one.
It has wings and a halo of light.

name: mithril golem
desc: Would be worth a fortune if you could actually make a dent in it.

name: ancient vampire
desc: Probably on a first name basis with Dracula.
It has wings and a halo of light.
In his house at R'lyeh dead Cthulhu waits dreaming.

name: ancient lich
desc: Not one lich in a hundred live to reach such heights.

name: The Gorborung
desc: The gargantuan entity in the depths of Mr. Gorbu never seen by mortal eyes.
The terror before the Wind Age
The serpent that grips the earth in its scales

name: primum mobile
desc: The force that moves the sun and stars
